stops.special_instructions: FCFS. Pallet Count: 8. Weight: 9516. DRIVER MUST HAVE STRAPS OR LOAD BARS.

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: If you partial this load, you lose 100% of the pay.
clauses_found.danger_simple_punjabi: ਜੇ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਹੋਰ ਮਾਲ ਵੀ ਲੋਡ ਕੀਤਾ, ਤਾਂ ਤੁਹਾਨੂੰ ਕੋਈ ਪੈਸਾ ਨਹੀਂ ਮਿਲੇਗਾ।
clauses_found.original_text: If the carrier partials any of our shipments, you will be fined 100% of the agreed-upon rate.

notification.title: Do Not Partial
notification.description: Strict prohibition on partialing. Fine is 100% of rate.
notification.original_clause: If the carrier partials any of our shipments, you will be fined 100% of the agreed-upon rate.

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: 25% fine (minimum $200) if the driver is late for delivery.
clauses_found.original_text: Carrier agrees to a 25% late fee (minimum $200 late fee) should driver arrive late to delivery.

notification.title: Late Fee Alert
notification.description: Ensure on-time delivery. Late fee is 25% (min $200). Call if delayed.
notification.original_clause: Carrier agrees to a 25% late fee (minimum $200 late fee) should driver arrive late to delivery.

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: You must notify Transfix 30 minutes BEFORE detention starts or you get paid $0.
clauses_found.danger_simple_punjabi: ਡਿਟੈਂਸ਼ਨ ਸ਼ੁਰੂ ਹੋਣ ਤੋਂ 30 ਮਿੰਟ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਦੱਸਣਾ ਲਾਜ਼ਮੀ ਹੈ ਨਹੀਂ ਤਾਂ ਪੈਸੇ ਨਹੀਂ ਮਿਲਣਗੇ।
clauses_found.original_text: Carriers must notify Transfix... 30 minutes before detention starts in order to be eligible for detention payout.

notification.title: Detention Alert Needed
notification.description: Notify Transfix NOW. You must alert them 30 mins before free time ends to get paid.
notification.original_clause: Carriers must notify Transfix... 30 minutes before detention starts

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: Fine up to $200 and detention denial if tracking is not used continuously.
clauses_found.danger_simple_punjabi: ਜੇਕਰ ਟਰੈਕਿੰਗ ਲਗਾਤਾਰ ਨਹੀਂ ਚੱਲੀ ਤਾਂ $200 ਤੱਕ ਜੁਰਮਾਨਾ ਲੱਗ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ।
clauses_found.original_text: If Transfix incurs penalties... right to deduct... up to 25% of carrier rate, not to exceed $200. Driver is ineligible for detention compensation if they do not track.

notification.title: Enable Tracking
notification.description: Start Transfix App tracking now. Penalty of $200 applies if not tracking.
notification.original_clause: The driver agrees to track continuously... Driver is ineligible for detention... if they do not track

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: Submit POD within 48 hours or lose accessorial pay (detention/lumpers).
clauses_found.danger_simple_punjabi: POD 48 ਘੰਟਿਆਂ ਦੇ ਅੰਦਰ ਜਮ੍ਹਾਂ ਕਰੋ, ਨਹੀਂ ਤਾਂ ਵਾਧੂ ਖਰਚੇ (ਲੰਪਰ/ਡਿਟੈਂਸ਼ਨ) ਨਹੀਂ ਮਿਲਣਗੇ।
clauses_found.original_text: Failure to submit within 48 hours will result in a rejection of any additional charges including, but not limited to, accessorials.

notification.title: Upload POD ASAP
notification.description: Upload POD within 48 hours of delivery to ensure payment of accessorials.
notification.original_clause: Failure to submit within 48 hours will result in a rejection of any additional charges

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: Driver must wear safety gear (vest, boots, etc).
clauses_found.danger_simple_punjabi: ਡਰਾਈਵਰ ਕੋਲ ਸੁਰੱਖਿਆ ਸਮਾਨ (ਵੈਸਟ, ਬੂਟ ਆਦਿ) ਹੋਣਾ ਲਾਜ਼ਮੀ ਹੈ।
clauses_found.original_text: Carriers are required to comply with Shipper specific PPE policies

notification.title: PPE Check
notification.description: Ensure driver has full PPE (Vest, Boots) before arrival.
notification.original_clause: Carriers are required to comply with Shipper specific PPE policies

driver_dispatch_view.pickup_instructions: Peloton Interactive. FCFS 14:00-17:00. Report to shipping office. Must have Straps/Load Bars.
driver_dispatch_view.delivery_instructions: Peloton c/o XPO Logistics. Appointment 07:00 AM Sharp. Live unload.
transit_requirements: Use Transfix Mobile App for tracking
Do NOT break seal without permission

driver_dispatch_instructions.description_en: Download and use Transfix App. Keep it on to avoid issues.
driver_dispatch_instructions.description_punjab: Transfix ਐਪ ਡਾਊਨਲੋਡ ਕਰੋ ਅਤੇ ਵਰਤੋ। ਸਮੱਸਿਆਵਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਬਚਣ ਲਈ ਇਸਨੂੰ ਚਾਲੂ ਰੱਖੋ।
driver_dispatch_instructions.original_clause: The driver agrees to track continuously throughout the entirety of the shipment via the Transfix mobile app

driver_dispatch_instructions.description_en: You must have straps or load bars. No TONU if you arrive without them.
driver_dispatch_instructions.description_punjab: ਤੁਹਾਡੇ ਕੋਲ ਪੱਟੇ ਜਾਂ ਲੋਡ ਬਾਰ ਹੋਣੇ ਚਾਹੀਦੇ ਹਨ। ਜੇ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਬਿਨਾਂ ਪਹੁੰਚਦੇ ਹੋ ਤਾਂ ਕੋਈ TONU ਨਹੀਂ ਮਿਲੇਗਾ।
driver_dispatch_instructions.original_clause: STRAPS OR LOAD BARS ARE REQUIRED FOR THIS SHIPMENT

driver_dispatch_instructions.description_en: Wear safety vest and boots at shipper and receiver.
driver_dispatch_instructions.description_punjab: ਸ਼ਿਪਰ ਅਤੇ ਰਿਸੀਵਰ 'ਤੇ ਸੁਰੱਖਿਆ ਵੈਸਟ ਅਤੇ ਬੂਟ ਪਾਓ।
